info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 12:22AM CDT until July 09 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BEAVER...SOUTHEASTERN TEXAS...LIPSCOMB...HANSFORD AND OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 1222 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Follett to 7 miles northeast of Gruver, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Spearman, Lipscomb, Booker, Gruver, Follett, Higgins, Darrouzett, Hardesty, Wolf Creek Park, Elmwood, Farnsworth, Waka, Bryans Corner, Slapout and Balko. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
